{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = ASUS EA-AC87.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = 5GHz Wireless AC1800 Media Bridge / Access Point |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.asus.com/Networks/Wireless_Adapters/EAAC87/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = ASUS_EA-AC87 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = ASUS |model = EA-AC87 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = A1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC1800 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = media bridge, access point |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = MSQ-EAAC87 |icid = 3568A-EAAC87 |us_id = <!-- US ID --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Quantenna;QT3840BC; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARC |cpu1_type_rev = 700 |cpu1spd = 500 <!-- 500 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L12845EMI-10G; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = ESMT;M15F1G1664A-ADB; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Realtek;RTL8367RB; |lan_ports = 5 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 10:C3:7B |oui = 10:C3:7B
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = none
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, internal,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, |jtag = yes,, 7-pin header,, unpopulated,,
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = MU-MIMO, signal-quality indicators |addchip = 5GHz Power Amplifier;Skyworks;SKY85405-11;;4; ,,, 5GHz SPDT Switch;Skyworks;SKY13370-374LF;;4; |802dot11_protocols = an+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = ASUS_5G |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Arcadyan |manuf_model = WA5005A |manuf_rev = AC44-ASU |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = common |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 09/03/2014 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B01560A5FI |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Quantenna;QT3840BC; |rad1chip2 = Quantenna;QT2518B; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad1ac = 1733 |nqam1 = 800 |rad1n = 450 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The device can operate as a Media Bridge or a Access Point. :AP: http://findasus.local (http://www.asusrouter.com) :SSID: ASUS_5G
"AW5005AAC44-ASU", "HannStar", "1505" (02/2015), ''ASUS'' logo and :"EA-AC87 REV 1.40" is silkscreened on the board in the photos.
{{see also|Arcadyan|ASUS RT-AC87U}} {{WiFiCert|WFA55379|06/27/2014}}
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.ixbt.com/comm/asus-ea-ac87.shtml ''Asus EA-AC87 Review'' on '''iXBT'''] (RU) :CPU: [[Quantenna]] QT3840BC @500MHz SoC (Argonaut RISC) :WLAN: [[Quantenna]] QT2518B 802.11ac 4T4R (1733Mbps) :RAM: 128MB, Flash: 16MB, Switch: [[Realtek]] RTL8367RB *[https://klseet.com/networking/asus/asus-ea-ac87 ''Asus EA-AC87 Review'' on '''K.L.Seet'''] *[http://foxnetlab.com/index.php/16-reviews/145-asus-ea-ac87 ''Asus EA-AC87 Review'' on '''FoxNetLab'''] :Flash: ''Macronix'' MX25L12845EMI-10G 16MB (SPI) :5GHz Power Amplifier: 4x [[Skyworks]] SKY85405-11 ([https://fccid.io/document.php?id=2375093 FCC images]) :5GHz SPDT Switch: 4x [[Skyworks]] SKY13370-374LF (SKY3370) *[https://openitforum.pl/index/recenzje/network/apoints/asus-ea-ac87-mediabridge-r217/ ''Asus EA-AC87 Review'' on '''OpenITforum'''] (PL)
===Forum threads=== * [http://koolshare.cn/thread-595-1-1.html Reviewed on '''KoolShare''' forums] (CN) (internal images) : [[Quantenna]] [http://www.quantenna.com/qsr-1000.html QSR1000] @500MHz ARC 700 Dual on-chip processors : [[Quantenna]] QSR1000 (QV840/HS800): SoC QT3840BC + RFIC QT2518B
===Blogs=== * [http://pcdiy.asus.com/2014/01/rt-ac87u-the-ultimate-router-4x4-mu-mimo-ces-2014/ ''RT-AC87U The Ultimate Router 4×4 MU-MIMO – CES 2014'' @ '''ASUS'''' PCDiY blog]
===Press releases=== * [http://www.quantenna.com/pressrelease-01_06_14_2.html ''Quantenna Powers World’s Fastest 802.11ac Dual-Band Wave 2 ASUS RT-AC87U Router'' - '''Quantenna''' press release]
===Other=== * [http://fccid.net/pdf.php?id=2332305 FCC doc w/ more details about the Quantenna QV840 chipset] (via an '''Actiontec''' filing) :This module is noted to contain a small 64KB SPI Flash w/ not :much else on-board besides the bootloader and calibration data. :The main firmware is uploaded to the device via its RGMII interface. * [http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/other/ces-2014/32309-asus-ac2300-router-coming ''ASUS AC2300 Router Coming'' @ '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :Wave 2, AC2400 :4x4 MU-MIMO 802.11ac :IEEE 802.11ac: 5 GHz (80MHz) 4T4R 1700 Mbps *[http://www.heise.de/newsticker/meldung/WLAN-mit-1700-MBit-s-2076151.html ''WLAN mit 1700 MBit/s'' @ '''heise.de''' (DE)] *[http://www.heise.de/newsticker/meldung/Erster-Chipsatz-fuer-11ac-WLAN-mit-4-MIMO-Streams-1869136.html ''Erster Chipsatz für 11ac-WLAN mit 4 MIMO-Streams'' @ '''heise.de''' (DE)]
==Pictures== ===@ koolshare.cn=== * [http://koolshare.cn/data/attachment/forum/201408/07/111700jhhcx1yihizrihyi.jpg Board top] * [http://koolshare.cn/data/attachment/forum/201408/07/111700u9d48ksne8o0pd09.jpg Board bottom] * [http://koolshare.cn/data/attachment/forum/201408/07/111700w83ykx2zyz27kvyr.jpg RTL8367RB GbE Switch] * [http://koolshare.cn/data/attachment/forum/201408/08/151306u5qhhxoj99o9vaj7.png Block diagram]
